Name: Jean
Title: "Dandelion Knight" Jean
Desc: Never believes that she has done well enough â€” not until final victory is hers, anyway.
Source: Reward for inviting Jean to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

15022.Name: Gale Blade
15022.Desc: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT], the target is forcibly switched to the next character.

15023.Name: Dandelion Breeze
15023.Desc: Heals all your characters for 2 HP, summons 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C115021]</color>.

C115021.Name: Dandelion Field
C115021.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase:</color> Deal 1 $[K105], heal your active character for 1 HP.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 2</color>

K105.Name: {SPRITE_PRESET#2105}<color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo DMG</color>
K105.Desc:
Reacts with Elements if they are already applied:
{SPRITE_PRESET#2105}{SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Cryo Swirl</color>: Deals 1 Cryo DMG to all opposing characters except the target
{SPRITE_PRESET#2105}{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Hydro Swirl</color>: Deals 1 Hydro DMG to all opposing characters except the target
{SPRITE_PRESET#2105}{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Pyro Swirl</color>: Deals 1 Pyro DMG to all opposing characters except the target
{SPRITE_PRESET#2105}{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Electro Swirl</color>: Deals 1 Electro DMG to all opposing characters except the target

K3.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>
K3.Desc: After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usages</color> remaining.
